item.name: Number of Monitors
item.description: Number of Monitors configured in Ceph cluster

item.name: Number of OSDs
item.description: Number of OSDs in Ceph cluster

item.name: Number of OSDs in state: IN
item.description: Total number of IN OSDs in Ceph cluster

item.name: Number of OSDs in state: UP
item.description: Total number of UP OSDs in Ceph cluster

item.name: Number of Placement Groups
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in Ceph cluster

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in Temporary state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in pg_temp state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in Active state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in active state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in Clean state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in clean state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in Peering state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in peering state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in Scrubbing state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in scrubbing state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in Undersized state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in undersized state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in Backfilling state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in backfilling state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in degraded state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in degraded state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in inconsistent state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in inconsistent state

item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in remapped state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in recovering state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in recovering state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in backfill_toofull state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in backfill_toofull state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in backfill_wait state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in backfill_wait state

item.name: Number of Placement Groups in recovery_wait state
item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in recovery_wait state

item.name: Number of Pools
item.description: Total number of pools in Ceph cluster

item.name: Ceph OSD avg fill
item.description: Average fill of OSDs

item.name: Ceph OSD max PGs
item.description: Maximum amount of PGs on OSDs

item.name: Ceph OSD min PGs
item.description: Minimum amount of PGs on OSDs

item.name: Ceph OSD avg PGs
item.description: Average amount of PGs on OSDs

item.name: Ceph backfill full ratio
item.description: Backfill full ratio setting of Ceph cluster as configured on OSDMap

item.name: Ceph full ratio
item.description: Full ratio setting of Ceph cluster as configured on OSDMap

item.name: Ceph OSD Apply latency Avg
item.description: Average apply latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph OSD Apply latency Max
item.description: Maximum apply latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph OSD Apply latency Min
item.description: Miniumum apply latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph OSD Commit latency Avg
item.description: Average commit latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph OSD Commit latency Max
item.description: Maximum commit latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph OSD Commit latency Min
item.description: Minimum commit latency of OSDs

item.name: Ceph OSD max fill
item.description: Percentage fill of maximum filled OSD

item.name: Ceph OSD min fill
item.description: Percentage fill of minimum filled OSD

item.name: Ceph nearfull ratio
item.description: Near full ratio setting of Ceph cluster as configured on OSDMap

item.name: Overall Ceph status
item.description: Overall Ceph cluster status, eg HEALTH_OK, HEALTH_WARN of HEALTH_ERR

item.name: Overal Ceph status (numeric)
item.description: Overal Ceph status in numeric value. OK: 0, WARN: 1, ERR: 2

item.name: Ceph Read bandwidth
item.description: Global read bandwidth

item.name: Ceph Read operations
item.description: Global read operations per second

item.name: Total bytes available
item.description: Total bytes available in Ceph cluster

item.name: Total bytes
item.description: Total (RAW) capacity of Ceph cluster in bytes

item.name: Total number of objects
item.description: Total number of objects in Ceph cluster

item.name: Total bytes used
item.description: Total bytes used in Ceph cluster

item.name: Ceph Write bandwidth
item.description: Global write bandwidth

item.name: Ceph Write operations
item.description: Global write operations per second

item.name: Ceph health log
item.description: Ceph cluster health log

trigger_prototype.name: Ceph OSD osd.{#OSD} is near full: {ITEM.VALUE}%

trigger_prototype.expression: {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.[osd.{#OSD},num_pgs].last()}>={ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.osd_avg_pgs.last()}*1.3 or {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.[osd.{#OSD},num_pgs].last()}<={ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.osd_avg_pgs.last()}*0.7
trigger_prototype.name: Ceph OSD osd.{#OSD} PG high deviation

trigger_prototype.expression: {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.[osd.{#OSD},up].last()}=1 and {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.[osd.{#OSD},up].count(5m,0)}>=1
trigger_prototype.name: Ceph OSD osd.{#OSD} is flapping

trigger_prototype.expression: {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.[{#POOL},bytes_used].forecast(2d,,5d)} >= {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.[{#POOL},bytes_used].last()} / {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.[{#POOL},percent_used].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Ceph Pool pool.{#POOL} is filling up
trigger_prototype.description: Pool.{#POOL} will be full in less than 5 days assuming the average fill-up rate of the past 48 hours.

trigger.name: Ceph cluster in ERR state
trigger.description: Ceph cluster is in ERR state

trigger.name: Ceph cluster in WARN state
trigger.description: Issue a trigger if Ceph cluster is in WARN state for >1h

trigger.name: Number of IN OSDs changed
trigger.description: Amount of OSDs in IN state changed

trigger.name: Number of UP OSDs changed
trigger.description: Amount of OSDs in UP state changed

trigger.expression: {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.num_osd.last()} - {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.num_osd_up.last()} >= {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.num_osd.last()} * 0.1
trigger.name: OSD 10% down

trigger.expression: {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.num_pg.last()}>{ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.num_pg_active.last()}
trigger.name: Ceph PG is inactive
trigger.description: Some PGs in Ceph are not active

trigger.expression: {ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.num_pg.last()}>{ceph-mgr Zabbix module v6:ceph.num_pg_clean.last()}
trigger.name: Ceph PG is unclean
trigger.description: Some PGs in Ceph are not clean
